review: The device would be exponentially better if they improved the wifi connectability. It seems that if the fire stick is not within a 5 foot proximity to a router, it will drop connection intermediatly. I would also make the recommendation of better organizing the user interface. The app selections of the fire stick are what makes the device. I just wish the apps could be organized more like a Roku or AppleTv. The Prime and PPV selections are a mess. Tighten it up!With all of that said, the device really has potential and the price point is great.
